alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Dewey; Ellis; Major; Roger Mills; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 9:27AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Ellis, southeastern Woods, northeastern Roger Mills, northwestern Blaine, Dewey, Major and southeastern Woodward Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 927 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Waynoka to near Cestos to 8 miles south of Arnett. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fairview, Arnett, Taloga, Waynoka, Seiling, Vici, Canton, Leedey, Cleo Springs, Longdale, Camargo, Oakwood, Mutual, Canton Lake, Quinlan, Orion, Chester, Orienta, Harmon, and Cestos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Dewey; Ellis; Major; Roger Mills; Woods; Woodward
